19 target::target (unsigned int id, target_state_t state, geometry_msgs::Pose pose, Time stamp) : id(id), state(state), pose(pose), stamp(stamp)
20 {
21  // read parameters
22  double loop_rate;
23  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/loop_rate", loop_rate, 5.0);
24  int queue_size;
25  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 10);
26  double timeout;
27  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/tracking_timeout", timeout, 5.0);
28  this->timeout = Duration(timeout);
29  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/target_tolerance", target_tolerance, 0.1);
30 
31  // initialize publishers
32  target_found_pub = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent>("target_found", queue_size);
33  target_update_pub = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent>("target_update", queue_size);
34  target_lost_pub = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent>("target_lost", queue_size);
35  target_done_pub = nh.advertise<cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent>("target_done", queue_size, true);
36 
37  // init loop rate
38  rate = new Rate(loop_rate);
39 
40  ROS_DEBUG("Added target %d in state %d", id, state);
41 
42  // inform others about newly found target
43  if (state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
44  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: unknown --> tracked, position (%.2f,%.2f)", id, pose.position.x, pose.position.y);
45 
46  // publish event
47  publish_event("target_found");
48  }
49 
50  else {
51  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: unknown --> known", id);
52  }
53 }
54 
55 target::~target ()
56 {
57  delete rate;
58 }

62  return pose;

64 
65 void target::lost ()
66 {
67  // target is being tracked
68  if (state == TARGET_TRACKED || state == TARGET_ASSIGNED) {
69  // no updates received within timeout
70  if (stamp + timeout < Time::now()) {
71  if (state == TARGET_TRACKED)
72  ROS_INFO("Target %d: tracked --> lost", id);
73  else if (state == TARGET_ASSIGNED)
74  ROS_INFO("Target %d: assigned --> lost", id);
75  else
76  ROS_INFO("Target %d: lost", id);
77 
78  // update target information
79  state = TARGET_LOST;
80 
81  // publish event
82  publish_event("target_lost");
83  }
84  }
85 }
86 
87 void target::operator= (const target& t)
88 {
89  id = t.id;
90  update(t.state, t.pose, t.stamp);
91 }
92 
93 void target::update (target_state_t state, geometry_msgs::Pose pose, Time stamp)
94 {
95  // this target has been completed already, nothing to do
96  if (this->state == TARGET_DONE) {
97  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: already done", id);
98  return;
99  }
100 
101  // this target has been assigned to another cps for completion but is still tracked
102  else if (this->state == TARGET_ASSIGNED) {
103  // update target information
104  this->state = state;
105  this->pose = pose;
106  this->stamp = stamp;
107 
108  // target completed by the other cps
109  if (state == TARGET_DONE) {
110  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: assigned --> done", id);
111 
112  // store target id in parameter server
113  vector<int> done;
114  nh.getParam(this_node::getNamespace() + "/targets_done", done);
115  done.push_back(id);
116  nh.setParam(this_node::getNamespace() + "/targets_done", done);
117 
118  // publish event
119  publish_event("target_done");
120  }
121 
122  // target still being tracked, send update
123  else if (state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
124  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: assigned, update", id);
125 
126  // publish event
127  publish_event("target_update");
128  }
129 
130  return;
131  }
132 
133  // target is being tracked
134  else if (this->state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
135  // send update
136  if (state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
137  // update target information
138  this->state = state;
139  this->pose = pose;
140  this->stamp = stamp;
141 
142  // compute distance that target moved
143  double moved = hypot(last_pose.position.x - pose.position.x, last_pose.position.y - pose.position.y);
144 
145  // target has moved enough for update
146  if (moved > target_tolerance) {
147  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: tracked, update", id);
148 
149  // store current pose
150  last_pose = pose;
151 
152  // publish event
153  publish_event("target_update");
154  }
155  }
156 
157  // target has been assigned to another cps
158  else if (state == TARGET_ASSIGNED) {
159  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: tracked --> assigned", id);
160 
161  // update target information
162  this->state = state;
163  this->stamp = stamp;
164 
165  // reaction to incoming swarm event, not necessary to publish event
166  }
167 
168  return;
169  }
170 
171  // target has been found by another cps
172  else if (this->state == TARGET_KNOWN) {
173  // target now found by this cps
174  if (state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
175  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: known --> tracked, position (%.2f,%.2f)", id, pose.position.x, pose.position.y);
176 
177  // update target information
178  this->state = state;
179  this->pose = pose;
180  this->stamp = stamp;
181 
182  // publish event
183  publish_event("target_found");
184  }
185 
186  // target has been assigned to another cps
187  else if (state == TARGET_ASSIGNED) {
188  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: known --> assigned", id);
189 
190  // update target information
191  this->state = state;
192  this->stamp = stamp;
193 
194  // reaction to incoming swarm event, not necessary to publish event
195  }
196 
197  // target has been lost by another cps
198  else if (state == TARGET_LOST) {
199  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: known --> lost", id);
200 
201  // update target information
202  this->state = state;
203  this->pose = pose;
204  this->stamp = stamp;
205 
206  // reaction to incoming swarm event, not necessary to publish event
207  }
208 
209  return;
210  }
211 
212  // target has been lost by another cps
213  else if (this->state == TARGET_LOST) {
214  // update target information
215  this->state = state;
216  this->pose = pose;
217  this->stamp = stamp;
218 
219  // target has been found by another cps
220  if (state == TARGET_KNOWN) {
221  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: lost --> known", id);
222 
223  // reaction to incoming swarm event, not necessary to publish event
224  }
225 
226  // target has been found by this cps
227  else if (state == TARGET_TRACKED) {
228  ROS_DEBUG("Target %d: lost --> tracked", id);
229 
230  // publish event
231  publish_event("target_found");
232  }
233 
234  return;
235  }
236 
237  else {
238  ROS_ERROR("Target %d: invalid state transition %d --> %d!", id, this->state, state);
239  }
240 }
241 
242 void target::publish_event (string event)
243 {
244  // create target position event
245  cpswarm_msgs::TargetPositionEvent target;
246  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped ps;
247  ps.pose = pose;
248  ps.header.frame_id = "local_origin_ned";
249  target.pose = ps;
250  target.header.stamp = Time::now();
251  target.swarmio.name = event;
252  target.id = id;
253 
254  // publish target position event
255  if (event == "target_found")
256  target_found_pub.publish(target);
257 
258  else if (event == "target_update")
259  target_update_pub.publish(target);
260 
261  else if (event == "target_lost")
262  target_lost_pub.publish(target);
263 
264  else if (event == "target_done")
265  target_done_pub.publish(target);
266 
267  else
268  ROS_ERROR("Not publishing invalid event %s!", event.c_str());
269 }
